ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine held still for a moment while Shadow Wing scanned him. The hum of the scanner causing soothing vibrations through his body. He tranformed back to bot

Lunarpine held still for a moment while Shadow Wing scanned him. The 
hum of the scanner causing soothing vibrations through his body.

He tranformed back to bot and started to follow her back to the CR 
room. He heard what she said about being a wolf. "You're what?" 
Lunarpine didn't know exactly what to think, "Just what are you 
thinking?" He was beginning to get upset "Why the Pit would you want 
to do something like that for?" 

He decided to let her explain herself before he jumped to conclusions.

(These two should be a couple, they're either loving each other or 
arguing about something.)
(One of these days Shadow Wing POW To the Moon:)
I gotta go do laundry, we'll pick up this argument later.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> 
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She turns on the scanner and scans Lunarpine.
> "Great! Now let's go and try to hook this up to a CR chamber." She 
> smiled. She just couldn't hold it in any longer.
> "IF all works well, I'll be a wolf in no time flat!" She turned and 
> started to head to the CR chamber room.
> 
> 
> OOC:( If this is not a legal move, then Shadow Wing will have to go 
> out and find a real wolf to scan.  But this can be found out when 
> working on the CR and the scanner hook up. Yanshosh, is this OK as 
a 
> move?)
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "OK" Lunarpine was confused, why would she need a DNA scan from 
> him? 
> > The reason wasn't important to him, he trusted her more than 
anybot 
> > around here. "I'll give you the scan, but I'm not a mechanic, I'd 
> > cross the wrong wires and probably remodel this place halfway 
> around 
> > this world. It'd take eons to pick up the pieces. You'll need to 
> find 
> > one of the techbots for that."
> > 
> > He figured that she'd be disapointed for whatever reason she 
needed 
> > the hookup. he transformed back to his wolf form for the scans. 
> > 
> > (Just a thought, if the scanners could replicate transformed DNA 
> then 
> > in the show Air Razor wouldn't have had to wait for a compatible 
> > lifeform, it would have used Rhinox or Cheetor so ask someone 
else 
> if 
> > this moves legal first.)
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > > 
> > > "I know will sound strange, but I need to scna you while in 
beast 
> > > mode.  Just trust me. If this works, things will look a lot 
> > brighter 
> > > around here." She smiled a huge smile. "And then I'll need you 
> help 
> > > me hook this thing up to a CR chamber."  She was having trouble 
> > > standing still, she was just too excited about this.  she 
prayed 
> to 
> > > the Matrix that this would work.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > Lunarpine stood up and transformed back to his bot 
mode. "I'll 
> > help 
> > > > if I can, what's the project and what do I have to do?"
> > > > 
> > > > He stepped toward Shadow Wing it was nice to see that 
somebody 
> > > > appreciated his abilities.
> > > >
